pages.text:
Tired of having to worry about your anvils constantly breaking? Then the improved anvil smashing setup is the right thing for you!   \
	\
	The setup consists of 4 main components. These are: **Winch**, **Crank**, **Ropes** and of course the **Anvil** itself. On the right page you can see, how to build it.
pages.title: Improved Anvil Smashing

pages.text: Right-click the crank to lift the anvil up and shift-right-click to let it drop down. Just like the regular anvil smashing you need to throw the items directly below it.
